title: Please help identify this font
content:
Can anybody help identify this font? Many thanks

author: Gavlar

comments.content:
What do people think of Klein's fonts on Dafont?  
 [http://www.dafont.com/manfred-klein.d302?psize=l&text=Halls](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109010019/http:/www.dafont.com/manfred-klein.d302?psize=l&text=Halls "http://www.dafont.com/manfred-klein.d302?psize=l&text=Halls")

hhp

You mean as different than the ones on his other sites:

[http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/klein/index.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109010019/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/klein/index.htm "http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/klein/index.htm")

[http://www.manfredklein.de/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109010019/http:/www.manfredklein.de/ "http://www.manfredklein.de/")

[http://manfred-klein.ina-mar.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109010019/http:/manfred-klein.ina-mar.com/ "http://manfred-klein.ina-mar.com/")

and a few other places no longer active.
